s_card-2-0000|3|text: Hehe, it’s an ultra loving glomp~!
s_card-2-0003|1|text: Sorry for making you study with me.
s_card-2-0003|2|text:
No, we help each other when in trouble,
right?
s_card-2-0003|3|text: Haha, I always rely on you.
s_card-2-0004|1|text: Your left hand like this... straight, okay?
s_card-2-0004|3|text:
Yes, straight!
Haha, you’re getting it, you’re getting it.
s_card-2-0005|1|text: Hehe, you fell for it again~♪
s_card-2-0006|1|text:
Nice muscles! What kind of training
do you do?
s_card-2-0006|2|text:
I’ll share my regimen, so tell me about
yours, Sumika.
s_card-2-0006|3|text:
Ahh, I don’t work out or anything,
so I’m good~.
s_card-2-0007|2|text:
Wow! So beautiful!
Shinosawa-san, you’re amazing!
s_card-2-0007|3|text: ...Haha. China, do you want to try?
s_card-2-0008|2|text:
Whaaa! Se-Sena-Oneesama...
You didn’t see that, did you!?
s_card-2-0008|3|text:
(Ughh... This is too much,
I’m happy and embarrassed!)
s_card-2-0009|2|text:
(Wait, she chugged it?
Something that tastes this bad!?)
s_card-2-0010|1|text:
It’s so warm...
Perfect for a nap.
s_card-2-0011|1|text:
Kotone, you really know how to present
yourself.
s_card-2-0011|2|text: You truly should belong to me.
s_card-2-0013|3|text:
...These little moments,
just one more year.
s_card-2-0014|2|text:
If you have questions,
don’t hesitate to ask.
s_card-2-0014|3|text: No need to hold back with the teacher.
s_card-2-0015|1|text: What are you listening to, Temari-chan?
s_card-2-0015|2|text:
Ah, hey...!
Don't touch without permission!
s_card-2-0019|1|text: Here we go, strike a pose!
s_card-2-0020|1|text: Hehe, feeling uneasy in a swimsuit?
s_card-2-0023|3|text: Ugh... Mao-senpai's back is so warm...
s_card-2-0024|1|text: Like this, and this! Got it!
s_card-2-0024|3|text:
Tightening not just the obi but also the
waist cord is the trick.
s_card-2-0025|2|text:
The cotton candy mask shouldn’t give
me away!
s_card-2-0027|1|text: How’s this year’s batch of freshmen?
s_card-2-0027|2|text: Hehe, full of diamonds in the rough.
s_card-2-0028|1|text:
Kotone-chan, your pampas grass is
really impressive!
s_card-2-0029|2|text:
Tsukimura-san’s personality is very
weird, you know.
s_card-2-0030|3|text:
What did you mix to get that color?
So mysterious.
s_card-2-0031|1|text: I saw it the other day...
s_card-2-0031|2|text:
My sister’s secret drink recipe.
Whisper whisper...
s_card-2-0032|1|text:
Waving a fan like this ensures even
roasting!
s_card-2-0032|2|text: I see... This is for better heat distribution.
s_card-2-0032|3|text:
This also prevents a smoky smell and
enhances the aroma!
s_card-2-0033|1|text:
Mao-senpai, your expression is stiff!
More! Smile more!
s_card-2-0033|2|text:
L-Like this?
I’m not used to this sort of thing.
s_card-2-0033|3|text:
Hmm, but even a worried Mao-senpai
is cute, so it’s fine!
s_card-2-0034|1|text:
Look, there’s a dragonfly!
How nostalgic.
s_card-2-0034|2|text: Let’s see who catches the most, Ume!
s_card-2-0035|2|text: I’ll deliver presents to good kids~.
s_card-2-0035|3|text:
Hehe~
Leave it to Ume the reindeer!
s_card-2-0036|1|text:
Rest your hand on your chin~
and lift the corners of your mouth!
s_card-2-0037|1|text: How about splitting it in half?
s_card-2-0037|3|text:
Your eyes are sparkling!
You’re so cute~!
s_card-3-0001|1|text:
(I hid instinctively...
What am I even doing?)
s_card-3-0002|2|text: You don’t need to get that mad!!
s_card-3-0002|3|text: These guys are such a hassle...
s_card-3-0003|1|text:
Alright! Makeup’s done!
Let’s go out and have fun!
s_card-3-0003|2|text:
Nope! Not good enough!
Stand up straight!
s_card-3-0003|3|text: I knew it, no good, ughhh!
s_card-3-0005|2|text:
...Yeah. We need to make sure we don’t
embarrass ourselves in front of the juniors.
s_card-3-0005|3|text: We need to try even harder, huh?
s_card-3-0006|3|text: Let’s push through together to the end!
s_card-3-0009|2|text: I-I’ll make it succeed no matter what!
s_card-3-0010|2|text:
This is my treasure!
I-Isn’t it adorable?
s_card-3-0010|3|text:
Both the teddy bear and China are
adorable!
s_card-3-0011|1|text:
President, Misuzu-chan!
We came to visit!
s_card-3-0011|2|text: Oh my. Hehe, you’re lively as always.
s_card-3-0011|3|text:
Geez... The student council room isn’t
a playground.
s_card-3-0014|1|text:
Still just the beginning, we’ve only just
started!
s_card-3-0014|2|text:
Let’s see some excitement so loud it
drowns out my voice!
s_card-3-0015|1|text:
Alright, let’s capture a photo fit for the
new student council!
s_card-3-0018|1|text:
Temari-chi～,
you’re not eating any snacks, are you?
s_card-3-0018|2|text: Are you on a diet or something?
s_card-3-0019|1|text: Hehe, it’s no trouble at all.
s_card-3-0019|2|text: Feel free to rely on me anytime.
s_card-3-0020|1|text:
Oh, it’s an autumn flavors fair!
I’m getting hungry just thinking about it.
s_card-3-0020|2|text:
Chestnut rice bento, rice balls...
And let’s get some sweets too!
s_card-3-0020|3|text:
Hehe... This kind of lunch is nice once
in a while!
s_card-3-0022|3|text: Hehe, maybe it’s a reward for cleaning?
s_card-3-0024|1|text:
Agh...
I don’t get it at all...
s_card-3-0024|2|text: Kotone! That’s not it, I told you!
s_card-3-0025|1|text: We made it all the way here, huh...
s_card-3-0025|3|text:
Time for celebratory food!
Let’s dig in!
s_card-3-0026|1|text:
Cleaning the pool seemed like such a
drag...
s_card-3-0026|2|text: But doing it with Lilja was fun!
s_card-3-0027|1|text:
Alright, everyone!
After grueling lessons, it’s—
s_card-3-0028|2|text:
Hmph,
do you think you can persuade me?
s_card-3-0029|3|text: We’re in sync only at times like this!
s_card-3-0030|2|text:
Hehe~ China-chan,
if you rush like that, you’ll get lost!
s_card-3-0030|3|text:
It’s fine!
I’m holding hands with Sis!
s_card-3-0031|1|text: Leave it to me. I’ll light it up for you.
s_card-3-0032|2|text:
N-No, not at all.
I was just deep in thought.
s_card-3-0032|3|text: About the problem kids I scouted...
s_card-3-0034|1|text:
How much longer until the laundry’s
done?
s_card-3-0034|3|text: Then I’ll pour us some more tea!
s_card-3-0035|3|text: Maybe I should give it a read.
s_card-3-0036|3|text: Hehe, it suits you so well! Super cute~!
s_card-3-0037|2|text:
Autumn is for art, reading, and food!
Let’s go enjoy some autumn flavors!
s_card-3-0037|3|text:
It’s always fun with China.
Hehe, thank you for everything.
s_card-3-0038|2|text:
Giving a speech to freshmen is a bit
nerve-wracking.
s_card-3-0038|3|text:
Even you get nervous, President?
That’s surprising.
s_card-3-0039|1|text:
Oh, Kotone.
I’ll go on ahead.
s_card-3-0039|3|text: Hehe. Think you can keep up?
s_card-3-0040|1|text:
Hehe~ It’s about time.
The timing is tricky, you know.
s_card-3-0040|3|text:
This side should be good to go.
Lilja, your turn.
s_card-3-0041|1|text:
Misuzu-chan!
Let’s check over there too!
s_card-3-0042|2|text:
The bus should come soon.
It’s getting a bit chilly, huh?
s_card-3-0042|3|text:
Here, Lilja,
I’ll share my scarf with you!
s_card-3-0043|1|text:
Hehe~ Gotcha～♪
Now I’m in the lead...!
s_card-3-0043|2|text:
Wait up～!
I won’t lose that easily!
s_card-3-0044|1|text:
Good work, Temari-chi~.
Want a sports drink?
s_card-3-0044|2|text: Lilja says she wants to try this part next.
s_card-3-0045|2|text: Perform this song on a big stage, right?!
s_card-3-0045|3|text: Hehe... There’s still a long way to go.
s_card-3-0046|3|text:
(The one who masters this song
is the best... me!)
